hanzi-su-wiki:
焦

Значения

Обгореть; обуглиться; подгореть. Беспокоиться; быть в нетерпении; нервничать. Кокс

Мнемоника

Лучше всего жарятся большие куски мяса. Птица 隹 на углях 灬 костра часто пригорает.

WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You take a turkey and try to boil it but you char it instead. That's what happens when you throw meat into a pot on high with no water in there.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You should know better than to try to boil something without water! Now what are you going to do with this raw, but charred turkey?!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're staring sadly at the charred turkey when you suddenly sense the Shougun (しょう) looming behind you. You were supposed to be cooking this turkey for him and now he looks really, really mad.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The Shougun reaches down and bites a charred hunk off the turkey. He yells and spits it out. Why did he do that?! You have no idea but it looked nasty.

焦字的基本解释

焦
jiāo
物体经火烧变成黑黄色并发硬、发脆：烧焦。焦土。焦头烂额。
烦躁，着急：焦急。焦虑。焦灼。焦躁不安。
酥，脆：焦脆。焦枣。
喻干燥到极点：唇焦口燥。焦枯。焦裂。焦渴。
一种质硬、多孔、发热量高的固体燃料：焦炭。焦煤。焦炼。
姓。

焦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》即消切，平宵，精。］
(1)谓物体受剧热后失去水分，变成黄黑色，并发脆、发硬。
(2)指烧焦。
(3)锅巴。
(4)物体烧焦所产生的气味。
(5)黄黑色。
(6)指焦炭。
(7)干燥；干枯。
(8)引申为枯竭。
(9)酥；脆。
(10)卷曲。
(11)着急，担忧。
(12)吵闹。
(13)中心点。参见“焦點”、“焦距”。
(14)见“焦嶢”。
(15)见“焦焦”。
(16)礁。
(17)通“巢”。
(18)通“爝”。炬。参见“焦火”。
(19)古代的金属炊器。军中用以夜间敲击报更。
(20)中医学名词。六腑之一。
(21)古国名。周初封国，春秋为晋邑，后属魏。在今河南省陕县南。
(22)姓。
[②]［qiáo］
［《集韻》慈焦切，平宵，從。］
(1)通“譙”。
(2)通“憔”。参见“焦2瘁”。
(3)用同“瞧”。

Radicals: 隹, 灬  (turkey, boil)
Meaning Mnemonic
You take a turkey and try to boil it but you char it instead. That's what happens when you throw meat into a pot on high with no water in there.
You should know better than to try to boil something without water! Now what are you going to do with this raw, but charred turkey?!
Reading Mnemonic
You're staring sadly at the charred turkey when you suddenly sense the Shougun (しょう) looming behind you. You were supposed to be cooking this turkey for him and now he looks really, really mad.
The Shougun reaches down and bites a charred hunk off the turkey. He yells and spits it out. Why did he do that?! You have no idea but it looked nasty.
